known_issues: System is still "acting up" after Version 11 deployment; user requests a full rebuild from scratch.

existing_features.title: Rework the voice conversion job lifecycle so a job is only marked completed when the frontend uploads the converted audio output, instead of the backend auto-completing jobs on a timer.

Update the frontend cover creation flow to run Replicate conversion first and then finalize the job by uploading the converted audio to the backend, with clear step-by-step progress and error handling.

Make Replicate token configuration robust in production: ensure `VITE_REPLICATE_API_TOKEN` is actually available to the running frontend build, and add an explicit user-facing warning + hard block when it is missing or empty.

new_feature_requests.summary: Update backend job APIs to support the revised flow: (1) create a processing job with input audio, (2) complete an existing job by storing the converted output blob, and (3) enforce authorization so only the job creator can complete their job.

projectName: Rebuild the AI cover creation flow end-to-end to eliminate the current “acting up” behavior
